sub_topic: Show that every group of order 8 is isomorphic to either the cyclic group C8, the quaternion group Q8, or the dihedral group D4.
message_1: Find all the possible elements, subgroups and their isomorphism classes for a group of order 8. Then determine if the group is isomorphic to either the cyclic group C8, the quaternion group Q8, or the dihedral group D4.
